markdown:
<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Standard">[Geomancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=100)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 212 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

You know how to draw power from the land around you, no matter the terrain, by attuning your magic to match its mystical properties.

 You might be a [druid](/Classes.aspx?ID=6) with an elemental focus (such as the [flame](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=5), [stone](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=6), or [wave](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=7) orders) or a naturalist with a touch of magic at your disposal. You could concentrate on a single type of terrain to wring every last drop of power from it or choose to wander the land to experience every type of terrain possible.

[Click here for more rules on using this archetype.](/Rules.aspx?ID=1520)

<document level="2" id="feat-2995" />

name: Geomancer
prerequisite: Trained in Nature; ability to cast spells from spell slots; at least one spell with the air, cold, earth, fire, plant, or water trait
prerequisite_markdown: Trained in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10); ability to cast spells from spell slots; at least one spell with the [air](/Traits.aspx?ID=5), [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [plant](/Traits.aspx?ID=125), or [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165) trait
